camera.pipeline0: udpsrc port=5000 ! application/x-rtp,encoding-name=H264,payload=96 ! rtph264depay ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! appsink
camera.pipeline1: udpsrc port=5001 ! application/x-rtp,encoding-name=H264,payload=97 ! rtph264depay ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! appsink

notes.mavlink_connection: Dynamic connection to Pi. Uses 'raspberrypi.local' for mDNS or auto-detected IP. Pi runs MAVProxy server on port 7000
notes.mavlink_auto_detect: If true and connection fails, automatically scan serial ports to find Pixhawk (for direct serial connections only)
notes.joystick_target: Partial name match: 'xbox', 'switch', 'playstation', etc. Set to null to auto-detect any controller.
notes.camera: Real camera streams from Raspberry Pi. Pi auto-detects Ground Station IP. Streams H.264 via UDP ports 5000/5001
notes.sensors: Real BMP388 sensor on Raspberry Pi. Pi runs sensor server on port 5002 (5000/5001 reserved for cameras). Uses 'raspberrypi.local' or auto-detected IP
notes.network: Auto-detection: Pi finds Ground Station via SSH client IP, gateway, or ARP. Ground Station finds Pi via mDNS (raspberrypi.local) or network scan
notes.thrusters: 8-channel thruster configuration. All 8 thrusters are controlled via channels 1-8
